message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think it's worth a lot to you, and I'm willing to start with a competitive price of $180. What do you think?
I appreciate your time, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
I understand that you're on a budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'm counteroffering at $160. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet halfway at $140?
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $140, but I'm willing to compromise further. I'll meet you at $155, which is the highest I'm willing to go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. How about we meet at $145?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $150, as I've already compromised quite a bit. I'm willing to meet you at $150, which is my absolute minimum. What do you think?
